PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Thoughts on Explosive Concoction:
Level 1: 77 to 116 added Fire Damage 23 to 35 added Cold Damage from Sapphire Flask 5 to 53 added Lightning Damage from Topaz Flask 30% more Damage with Ignite from Ruby Flask
IMPORTANT: this is an attack skill. We have to get some Accuracy from the tree and items to hit 100% hit rate. We cannot use Resolute Technique, because then we don't get the benefit from Elemental Overload
To feel comparable, the added damage from occupying 3 Flask Slots will have to be significant.
Other thoughts: - Fasting (flask medium cluster notable) can give 20% movespeed and 20% charges gained while no flasks are active. We could use an instant Divine Life Flask as well as an auto-cast flask and literally never touch our Flasks outside of the occasional Dying Sun for clearing large packs - Dyadian Dawn might make the Ignite too fast, same with Replica Emberwake. Using Blasphemer's Grasp and Cyclopean Coil will work well with scaling DoT multi which will be removed from most other sources according to the Development Manifesto, especially medium cluster jewels - Rigwald's Curse, Doryani's Fist and other unarmed uniques won't work with Explosive Concoction - Will have to keep an eye open for what they do to Cinderswallow since Onslaught Flasks will see large changes. Potential 4th flask for ignite damage - Budget options: Carcass Jack, Dyadian Dawn
Known changes: - Liege of the Primordial: removed increased Damage per Golems (25% per), buffed Golem effect from 25% to 100% (+) - New Flask Cluster next to Primeval Force; use depends on how heavy we'll have to go into Flasks (neutral) - Sources of Avoiding Elemental Ailments are getting changed; will probably have to find new ways to become immune to Ailments (neutral)
